title: Point estimate proportion of canceled reservations

content.question: A large-sample 98 percent confidence interval for the proportion of hotel reservations that are canceled on the intended arrival day is (0.048, 0.112). What is the point estimate for the proportion of hotel reservations that are canceled on the intended arrival day from which this interval was constructed?

choices.label: It cannot be determined from the information given.

topic.text: 6.2: Constructing a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
